item.title: Viewing source code for a function
item.description: Rationale Yesterday, I wanted to take a look at the source code of cor.test() function in R. I did what I usually do in such case - namely, I called the function and I expected to see the code straight way. cor.test ## function (x, ...) ## UseMethod("cor.test") ## <bytecode: 0x000000001463dcb8> ## <environment: namespace:stats> Unfortunately, I didnâ€™t get the code but instead I recieved information that it comes from a S3 generic function.
